unnormalised: Okay, so my uncle, let's call him Sharmaji, just got diagnosed with something the doctor called "Stage 2 BC". Now, Sharmaji, bless his heart, thinks BC stands for "Before Chai" – as in, his life pre-morning cuppa. He was asking me if there's a cure for BC, because going without chai is just unthinkable! I tried explaining it's actually "Breast Cancer," but he still insists on calling it "BC" – easier to remember, apparently. Gotta love the man’s spirit, even with this whole oncology thing hanging over his head. Docs at Tata Memorial have recommended chemo + some radiation thingy...Sounds intense.
